timeline.bodyText: Why using com.google.common.collect.Lists and not standard JDK stuff?
timeline.author: troger

replies.bodyText:
getPages() returns an iterable, and there's no one-method way of doing the conversion to a list in pure Java. But I could use Apache Commons Collections instead of Guava here.
Note that in this patch I wanted to do the minimum changes possible to separate migration tasks from refactorings/cleanups.
replies.author: efge
